Module jBomberman
Package model

Class LevelAbstract

java.lang.Object
model.LevelAbstract
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyGridFormat
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratorLevel, LevelConcrete
public abstract class LevelAbstract extends Object implements MyGridFormat
Abstract class used to manage every level subtype. It has methods to flag object in the grid to trespass and define a Collection in which set object to destruction

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface model.MyGridFormat

    COLUMNS, REGULAR_WALLS, ROWS
